Conferences

Marco Pagani, Debora Cutuli, Adam Liska, Paola Caporali, Daniela Laricchiuta, Francesca Foti, Cristina Neri, Laura Petrosini, Alessandro Gozzi (2015). 23rd Annual Meeting and Exhibition of the International Society for Magnetic Resonance in Medicine (ISMRM 2015).
